title.bibl: Greek Star, Aug. 17, 1906. Chicago Greek Organization Is Thanked

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

div.bibl: Star, Aug. 17, 1906. CHICAGO GREEK ORGANIZATION IS THANKED

body.p: p. 5- A letter of appreciation from the Panhellenic Association for the Prevention of Tuberculosis, of Athens, Greece, has been received by the Panhellenic Society of Chicago for its generous contribution of $200.
This sum was sent by the Chicago organization to the Metropolitan of Athens for this Greek institution which combats the dreaded disease of tuberculosis.

Kindly accept the deep gratitude of the Panhellenic Association for the Prevention of Tuberculosis for your philanthropic and generous contribution of forty pounds sterling, which was handed to us by His Eminence the Metropolitan of Athens, Greece.
